duties_responsibilities.duty: Maintain and evolve the Video delivery and SVOD platform.
Design and Build cloud-based microservices to support video processing workflows.
Field questions and requests regarding APIs and behavior.
Work closely with the partnership team about media delivery to outside partners.
Work on streamlined CI/CD solutions and building shared libraries and architecture.
Modernize and optimize the cloud Video Partner Delivery platform.
Building new microservices, features and improving Video Delivery / Content Filtering solutions.
Maintaining cloud services in GCP/AWS that power content sharing with partners like Apple, Amazon, Youtube etc.
Re-architecture and modernizing existing systems into the cloud.

education_certification.credential: BS degree in Computer Science, similar technical field of study or equivalent practical experience
